Tips for out-of-core loadingÂ¶

Note

when calling iterload, no data is loaded to memory if not needed.

Register to load up to 50-th frame and skip every 2 frames

In [1]: import pytraj as pt

In [2]: traj = pt.iterload('tz2.nc', 'tz2.parm7', frame_slice=(0, 50, 2))

In [3]: traj
Out[3]: 
<pytraj.TrajectoryIterator, 25 frames, include:
<Topology: 223 atoms, 13 residues, 1 mols, non-PBC>>

Register to load all frames

In [4]: import pytraj as ptraj as pt
   ...: traj = pt.iterload('tz2.nc', 'tz2.parm7')
   ...: traj
   ...: 
  File "<ipython-input-4-ec229d863b68>", line 1
    import pytraj as ptraj as pt
                            ^
SyntaxError: invalid syntax

Out[6]: 
<pytraj.TrajectoryIterator, 101 frames, include:
<Topology: 223 atoms, 13 residues, 1 mols, non-PBC>>
